Reviews.Title: worked great
Reviews.Author: brian hargrove
Reviews.Content: Worked great did just what it said it would do. My xtra computer monitor is now my new security monitor.i was looking at paying $200.00 for a security monitor and for less than $40. i am up and running.Thank YouBrian Hargrove

Reviews.Title: just what was needed
Reviews.Author: A. Preiss
Reviews.Content: handy device that's cheaper than new B/W CCTV for the old security system. Simple to install, and attach typical PC monitor.

Reviews.Title: works for occasional camera viewing.
Reviews.Author: James Stallings "Hacker and tinker"
Reviews.Content: We have aa need to view cameras occasionally, like once every few months. This works, and means we don't need a seperate monitor.

Reviews.Title: Arrived with problems, but I got it to work
Reviews.Author: digger
Reviews.Content: I bought this thing so that I could make adjustments to a surveillance camera and see their results on a small computer VGA monitor.  The camera uses BNC connectors.The package was mailed from Schenzen, China and arrived in 11 calendar days.  To be fair, it arrived before the projected date.The first problem, a big one, was the power adapter had a European plug (two round prongs) instead of a U.S.  So I went to Radio Shack and overpaid $11.00 for a European-to-U.S. adapter.  A U.S. CCTV seller sells an almost identical converter for $90, so the less than $23 I paid for this converter plus the $11.00 was still a bargain.Second, one of the toggle buttons, the one marked PP, was stuck.  After about 30 minutes of jiggling and pulling on it, I got it to work.Those problems resolved, it worked OK.  It does what I wanted it to do.

Reviews.Title: Poor Display
Reviews.Author: Disappointed Customer
Reviews.Content: Once everything was connected the picture would fade in and out or disappear completely. The BNC end appears to fit OK but any movement causes the picture to scramble or fade. Touch the box and the picture will come back if its not displaying, if it is displaying and you touch the box the picture will mess up.Very disappointed in this product.

Reviews.Title: Works well
Reviews.Author: G. Turner
Reviews.Content: I had bought another bnc to vga converter (a different brand), and it failed in one month. I hate spending money on junk!!!This is still going strong. I use it to convert the tv output of my security dvr to vga. Works very well indeed.

Reviews.Title: Works really good!
Reviews.Author: Ram Zamora
Reviews.Content: I wasn't sure if it was going to do the job, but it does.  The item works as advertised and so far so good.

Reviews.Title: at least the unit works... the LCD I bought was junk.
Reviews.Author: Larry Heinly
Reviews.Content: it's OK, not the best quality but it works.... may get different one of these too.  Larry Heinly Venice Ca.

Reviews.Title: Works Great.
Reviews.Author: Robert McBrien
Reviews.Content: Works as advertised. I have been using this product for a while now and I have had no problems with it.

Reviews.Title: Works!
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: I had an extra computer monitor and need a converter for a standard CCTV camera.  It works perfectly, viewing my front porch and driveway so that I can see who is there day and night, and especially who rings my doorbell. I live in an open neighborhood, so anyone can solicit, and they do.  I am a PI and opening the door to a stranger is the most insane thing a homeowner can do.

Reviews.Title: For under $20, this thing is amazing.
Reviews.Author: Honest Review
Reviews.Content: It works great! My only complaint is that it shipped without the AC adapter and I had to send an email. There's a bit of a language barrier, but they shipped a power supply from China and I got it in about a week. No problem since I had a wall wart to use in the meantime. The device itself is great, though, and I am purchasing more.

Reviews.Title: great service
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Tarness
Reviews.Content: Excellent easy to useEasy to hook upWorked greatNo issues at allQuick delivery No problems at all

Reviews.Title: HEADLINE
Reviews.Author: rob
Reviews.Content: GREAT ITEMS FOR THE PRICE.DID WHAT I NEEDED IT TO DO.VERY EASY TO USE.HAD NO PROBLEMS PROGRAMING REALLY

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Chief Wags
Reviews.Content: Worked to hook up a camera system to my TV  in the bedroom. Now I can monitor all my cameras just by pushing one button on my remote.

Reviews.Title: use multiple video devices on your pc monitor!
Reviews.Author: RR
Reviews.Content: works great you can run several different video sources into your pc monitor!..  like security cameras, game consoles , etc.

Reviews.Title: Good unit
Reviews.Author: xxx
Reviews.Content: Worked well to connect surveillance cameras to a vga monitor.  Small size and smooth shape is good for mounting near the small monitor.

Reviews.Title: Makes use of CCTV technology on DB15 monitors
Reviews.Author: D. Dunn
Reviews.Content: Does exactly what it is advertised to do.  Allowed my to display my CCTV on a monitor for downstairs monitoring.

Reviews.Title: great!
Reviews.Author: Dean Novak
Reviews.Content: Works great, just beware you have to also buy a plug adapter from German to USA for the 120v plug. $10 bucks at radio shack or buy them on Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Good product!
Reviews.Author: john davis
Reviews.Content: Great alternative to buying a monitor with BNC inputs.  If you doing a small camera job this might save some money.

Reviews.Title: Works as advertized
Reviews.Author: Phil F. Romley
Reviews.Content: Picture is lacking a bit of detail.  Perhaps an artifact of the conversion process and remember, it is not super expensive.

Reviews.Title: Does the trick
Reviews.Author: jake morgan
Reviews.Content: This thing is like sold from many many places and sometimes under different brand names but they all appear to be the same unit made by the same manufacturer.  We had a goofy document image camera that needed conversion from just video to VGA and this thing did the trick.  However, I did notice if the video became too hot ( over 100 units on the scope ) it didn't seem to be able to handle it very well.  Also I notice on some monitors a thin line down the left side like horizontal blanking was off a bit but that did not appear on every monitor so it may just be with some.  For the price and what it does - you can't go wrong.  Just don't expect the highest quality image output for broadcast quality commercial use but for personal and some industrial applications this unit is a life saver.  Also it has still store on it so you can load up a black frame or something else and have it send that out - in case you need to be able to send some type of signal down the wire when you are using a ABCD switcher and keep your monitors from flipping out or shutting off because you aren't feeding them a signal.

Reviews.Title: Good unit with poor documentation
Reviews.Author: Karen Holmes
Reviews.Content: Used this device to convert the BNC video-out jack of a security DVR into the analog VGA signal needed by a cheap PC monitor. The cheapest security monitor I could find was over 300 while this device allowed me to use an old spare flat panel that I already had. The documentation is worthless and confusing. When I read it, I actually thought I had bought the wrong unit, but in using common sense and hooking it up, it works perfectly. You may want to save the documentation for an emergency in case you run out of TP, but definitely don't waste time reading it.

Reviews.Title: It works
Reviews.Author: mark s willis
Reviews.Content: All i care about is the fact,it works.We used this item to hook up our security cameras to  a computer  monitor.

Reviews.Title: GREAT AND EASY TO SET UP !
Reviews.Author: Brian Lynch
Reviews.Content: Used this on a customers older computer monitor. They needed a second monitor to see what was going on around their business and this worked perfectly. just plugged it in and we were good to go !!

Reviews.Title: cctv
Reviews.Author: CCTV
Reviews.Content: Product was received as promised and works great. Couldn't ask for a better product.  Would recommend product for use by others to allow viewing on a computer monitor.

Reviews.Title: Finally, got what we needed
Reviews.Author: Deb
Reviews.Content: After many trys, we finally got the right converter and then everything started to work! Thank you. We were a little discouraged and disheartened until this product.

Reviews.Title: Easy set up
Reviews.Author: Carlo Zangrilli
Reviews.Content: Got a new DVR for surveillance system and wanted to use an old computer monitor as a viewing monitor.  This converter allowed me to use bnc connector out to the vga monitor with ease.

Reviews.Title: great price on this item
Reviews.Author: David A. Henderson
Reviews.Content: fairly fast service good  price on this item it gets the job done it is easy to connect and operate

Reviews.Title: Easy to use and it worked for my application
Reviews.Author: mark miget
Reviews.Content: exactly what i needed to conntect my video feed to a computer monitor.  ease of use was great. would order again

Reviews.Title: Works
Reviews.Author: Joengelhart
Reviews.Content: Works great! isn't as clear as I would like it but maybe its just the settings I have it on!

Reviews.Title: Video Signal Converter
Reviews.Author: NYS Dept of Transportation - Region 5 - Info Tech
Reviews.Content: I needed to convert a BNC input to VGA in order to replace a monitor at a reasonable cost.  This did it quick and easy for a lot less money than adding the BNC connection to a monitor

Reviews.Title: Just what I needed
Reviews.Author: J
Reviews.Content: Works good. Short wait time easy to attach look forward to using it. Thank you and have a good day.

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: Not much else to say.  It works great.  Picture is clear with my security cameras to my old computer LCD monitor.  Perfect.

Reviews.Title: cctv camera BNC s video
Reviews.Author: christopher young
Reviews.Content: good display, but the function buttons you have the work hard to get them to work, but all and all it does the job i wanted it to do.I guess you get what you pay for. The delivery was super fast, and i plan to do more business with them in the near future

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: LG
Reviews.Content: Its quality isn't the best but it does exactly what it says. So if you dont need something to be pro level and your on a budget you will be happy.

Reviews.Title: A way around an expensive trap!
Reviews.Author: Christopher "Chris"
Reviews.Content: The monitors necessary for Security camera systems most times have BNC inputs on the back of them. It's almost as if the manufacturers of the Security systems know they can make a ton of money by selling their own monitors. Hmmm............................................................There's a way around that though: With this box. Save yourself hundreds of dollars and buy this box! All you need to do is input the BNC signal into the box and then output your VGA signal to a standard computer monitor. There is a power source for this box, but it is one simple plug. This is the bottom line when the monitor that came with your system dies.Short and Sweet: Don't be fooled! Do NOT buy a BNC Monitor, buy one of these and a regular monitor!!!

Reviews.Title: Converts NTSC to VGA
Reviews.Author: Rusted Nut Garage
Reviews.Content: A friend of mine gave me a flat screen monitor he recently retired.  Silly me! I assumed it also had a video input, but it did not.  So I purchased this little converter to allow me to use it to test video cameras and surveillance equipment.  I put the camera video into the BNC connector and plugged the monitor into the proper port.  This is a powered device and I powered the converter with the power supply provided.  Turned everything on and toggled the video to the proper input mode and up came the camera.  It comes with a VGA and S video cables.  It looks like it will also take S video and convert it to VGA however I did not test that function.  The unit comes with documentation outlining the port functions and describing the controls.  The seller was very prompt and I received it just days after ordering.  I could not be happier !

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected
Reviews.Author: John Dodger
Reviews.Content: It didn't do the job I expected it to - connect composite video to VGA - at least on my system..

Reviews.Title: Cabel set-top box to monitor--success!
Reviews.Author: ERIC N MRAK
Reviews.Content: Scenario: I have a cable set-top-box (non-HD) that outputs S-Video or RCA (Red/White + Yellow) but no TV. I do, however, have an extra monitor that takes DVI, VGA, or HDMI.Turns out it is quite hard to connect these two devices. Who knew?After looking around and trying out some S-Video and RCA to VGA adapters I discovered that these adapters seem to never work. I was reminded after a quick trip to Google that S-Video uses a completely different separation of data than VGA and RCA. To have any conversion take place between S-Video and VGA you actually have to have something with a microchip to make the switch-over.Found this, bought it (it comes with an S-Video cable!) plugged in my cable box's S-Video into this converter, then connected the converter via VGA to the monitor. BAM. I don't have to buy a TV to watch Law & Order re-runs.NOTE: my monitor also had in-build speakers. I hooked these up with a splitter that converts RCA Red+White male audio into a 3.5mm male headphone jack. They are super cheap on Amazon ($1-$2). My cable-box can control the volume itself, so I just leave the monitor volume at the max level.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: SSML
Reviews.Content: Simply Great. Great Product. Great Seller. Product reached very fast. All descriptions were correct. Price was the best. Simply Great.

Reviews.Title: Great item
Reviews.Author: Greg Harkins
Reviews.Content: We added this item to our video system in house to allow us to connect computer monitors to the CCTV system and it is amazine!

Reviews.Title: complete s***
Reviews.Author: anthony
Reviews.Content: the picture has lost way too much signal coming through this the device my color cameras now look almost black and white i knew i would lose a bit of signal but really anyway don't buy for your security cameras.......

Reviews.Title: Looks like it would work.
Reviews.Author: aaronofruston
Reviews.Content: Screen just rolls constantly and no adjustments seem to help. You can see the image as if its being tossed in the dryer. Hopeless...

Reviews.Title: Made in China
Reviews.Author: Judith Young
Reviews.Content: This piece of junk didn't even last a week, it would have cost me more to send it back than what it cost so I chucked it in the round file.

Reviews.Title: Hate it.
Reviews.Author: wendy
Reviews.Content: this product is not what I wanted and now i am stuck with it. O well, cant win every time

Reviews.Title: vga monitor conerter box
Reviews.Author: ivan2medford
Reviews.Content: I hunted for a converter box,couldn't find one any where.I was about to give up.Then i chect on amazon.com,found one at a very good price.A few days latter recived it, plug it in works great very happly with it.

Reviews.Title: Not work
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: We placed this video convert for convert TV signal to MY laptop. After connecting everything as manual direction, what I got on my laptop was the video images that kept scrolling vertically. It doesn't matter what VGA resolution that I choose for the laptop. The manual and customer service can not provide any advice about what to do if it happens. It is useless for me now. Do not try this product, will disappoint you.
